data.text: @HappenShitDoes so you mean to tell me the woman who called had no idea who her own neighbor was?  and if she made a mistake why deny it when he confronted her she could have just owned up to it and apologized.

@jayjay38941529 Did the thought occur to you that the police were doing their job?! Robbery calls are dangerous & until police find out who the person/people are inside alleged robbery scene, they have to safe guard themselves. If robber is willing to rob someone, they might shoot them as well.
